## Session.invite() method

Send re-INVITE request. Modifying a session. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3261\#section-14.1

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
invite(delegate?: OutgoingInviteRequestDelegate, options?: RequestOptions): OutgoingInviteRequest;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  delegate | <code>OutgoingInviteRequestDelegate</code> | Request delegate. |
|  options | <code>RequestOptions</code> | Options bucket. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`OutgoingInviteRequest`
